subPoints.message: Changed the header to be an image (thanks [Space Pawdity](https://neurosongs.netlify.app/users/jr3mIiI6v3WOVZQW1khWXR31bXu1)!)
Changed some of the fonts to match with the new branding

message: Changed display of updates on homepage
Minor changes to handling of screen resizing
Added a checkbox to let users accept privacy policy during signup process
Replaced homepage icon with custom logo
Added extra confirmation screen to Google sign-in
Display dark mode toggle switch in the center of page
Added edit button and delete button to song page
Added markdown rendering to content description, user description, and comments.
Hide the user dropdown after shifting focus away from avatar image in right-hand corner
Added song description to currently playing song on album page
